boardgame.name: Panzer Leader
boardgame.description: (from the back of the box: )_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Panzer Leader lets you re-create all of the fast, furious action of tactical armored combat on the western front during World War II. Rules of play consider aspects of tactical armored warfare such as gun ranges, target elevation, indirect artillery fire, fortifications, roadblocks, minefields, close air support, naval support fire, engineer demolition, and opportunity fire._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Avalon Hill Complexity Rating - 7_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sister game to PanzerBlitz and The Arab Israeli Wars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 384 (including 7 blanks) British, US, and German counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 geomorphic boards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 20 scenarios_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Terrain Effects Chart (two-sided)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Combat Results Chart_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rules of Play and Designer's Notes booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 six-sided die_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Very good condition. I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;t gotten around to counting all of the pieces in this game, but the previous owner has sorted them all into little plastic snap cases, and given that attention to detail, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;d guess that they are all there. The rulebook is filled with checkmarks, as if the owner had checked off each rule as they read it. I think I also have some general supplements for this game, containing additional scenarios and such. Pictures available upon request.
Punched. Missing one generic Wreck counter. The box shows moderate wear but is completely intact. Mapboards, charts, and rules are in very good condition.

Complete game in very nice condition Pieces are punched but come stored in clear plastic counter storage tray Minimal scuffing on box cover Includes counters and rules booklet for the Panzer Leader 1940 variant
Box has minimal shelf wear, but contents are completely UNPUNCHED!

The box shows a fair amount of wear and has one corner split and taped. One side of the box has part of a Toys R Us sticker on it. The boards and counters, however, are in excellent shape showing almost no wear from play. The counters are as follows: 175 allied pieces, 129 german pieces and 55 white general use counters. There are some blank counters in the mix that could be used for replacements.

This is the classic game of tactical armored combat on the western front of World War II based on the Panzerblitz system. The box is in Good to Very Good condition (remains of a sticker on the front, a slight tape pull on the back of the box). The game itself is apparently complete (no roster sheet of counters available), playable and in Excellent, punched, condition! NO RESERVE! Shipping within EU = 9.00 EUR For information visit www.GiochinScatola.it
no missing components

Overall condion: Poor --Incomplete --Counters: ----1 Allied 76mm AT gun scrawled on blank ----1 German Engineer unit on blank ----1 German Rifle creased/dented ----1 Bren Carrier on blank ----Missing: 1 Allied M8 Armored Car (1 Allied blank unused) ----Missing: 1 German Wespe ----1 German Hetzer on blank; 1 damaged (creased corner) ----Missing: 1 German PzKw-IV ----Smudges on spotted/opportunity fire/wreck cards ----Backs of spotted/opportunity fire/wreck cards painted black --Rulebook: Very worn, wrinkled, and written in (it looks like I took inventory a long time ago; there are a bunch of notes by the units (how many, etc). --Scenarios: Good condition --Map: Good condition --Box: Top: One corner taped, top is dished; Bottom: 2 corners taped --Summary: A very worn, very played game. Actual shipping from zip code 48104 via Buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s preferred shipping method.

Panzer Leader: a game of tactical warfare on the Western front 1944-1945, Avalon hill 1974 The contents are complete in excellent condition. The box is very good, with a couple of minor scratches on the top lid.
Gsme is in goood shape and is complete

All components present except die (missing). Components generally in good to very good condition, although rulebook and box show significant wear (damage to corners of box has been repaired with tape). Will include with sale photocopies of rulebook and scenario cards (along with originals) and several articles from A-H_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s magazine The General relating to the game.

Box: Good condition no splits or tears some rubbing on the corners. Map: 4 mounted map boards all in very good condition Rules: 36 pages in very good condition light reading wear. Charts: 1 quick reference combat table, one terrain chart, 5 scenario cards with scenarios 1-20, one home made turn sequence card, all in very good condition Dice: 1D6 Counters: 384 punched and checked counters bagged all in good condition, the blank counters have also used to make up extra units Weight: 1300g Will also include a huge set of articles fom the general on the game

Never played. Game pieces 80% unpunched. Scenerio cards still attached to pad. Perfect condition. Box looks new. Doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get much better then this. Nice collectible copy.

This purchase by auction reserved for Mark Fischer. Vintage 1974 Avalon Hill game #812. Game of Tactical Warfare on the Western Front 1944-45. Box is solid with shelf wear. Sprues are partially punched. The game is complete except that there are supposed to be 384 tiles. I have counted three times and 2 tiles are missing. I think more than likely that they were blanks that I threw out decades ago when I first got the game. However, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know for sure, and there are certainly other blanks in the box.

Box is crushed and worn, but the contents is 100% clean and present. All game pieces are separated into zip-lock bags. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. CONDITION: Excellent condition, contents mint, unused and complete, with unpunched counters. The box has some shelfwear, but the contents are pristine. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: Â£5.50 European Postage: Â£11.50 Rest of World Postage: Â£22.00 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently Â£39 per package for Small Packets, Â£150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.
